name: Family Va-cat-ion
description:
Our submission for the GAMERella Global 2021

Play as Mango the Cat who is on a road trip with their family. Mango's Grandpaw is alseep leaving Mango tasked with paying attention to the road and driving safely to their destination. However, the kids, Rose and Emeaow, are getting bored! Safely drive to your destination with all your luggage in tow without getting distracted by your kids chat-tering! Watch for the button prompt that appears on the screen and successfully input it to avoid the obstacles or risk losing your luggage!

Instructions: Press the F key when prompted to successfully avoid obstacles.

Credits
